eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.ds
Interface AdvanceDataStoreUpdate

All Known Subinterfaces:
AdvanceDataStore
All Known Implementing Classes:
CheckedDataStore, DummyDataStore, HttpRemoteDataStore, JDBCDataStore, LocalDataStore
public interface AdvanceDataStoreUpdate

Interface having only the updateXYZ methods of the datastore.

This will help implement the SQL dialect specific insert or update operations on a JDBC datastore.

The users of the updateXYZ methods must set the modifiedBy field.

Author:
akarnokd, 2011.10.17.

updateNotificationGroups

                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     AdvanceControlException
Update the notification groups. Note that this update is considered complete, e.g., the existing group settings will be deleted and replaced by the contents of the map.

Parameters:
